CustomField.description: PreSales : Sprint 6: Req#2171 PreSales, Sprint 10, Requirement: 3099 - no longer used after March 2021 due to AP2021
CustomField.formula: PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_DNI__c +PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_MPC__c + PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Nuage__c + PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_IPR__c + PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Services__c + PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_Optics__c + PSR_Cost_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicate cost of the PSRO. May need to contact Pricing Manager(s) for new products/customers. In case of challenge obtaining true cost, click “Automatically Calculate Estimated Cost” in the sales value section below
CustomField.label: OLD Cost BG ION
